name: Conscience (birk.lerviks, Jintastic, ASH-Aalto)
description:
Conscience is a short narrative-focused mystery horror game in which you explore a house to find out what happened to the family that lived there.

The game is a student project made in Unreal Engine 5. It was designed with the goal of minimal jumpscares and compelling atmosphere.

Developers:

  • Atte Haarakangas
  • Birk Lerviks
  • Chao Cui
  • Daniel Zsemberi
  • Marija Šumarac
  • Veera Wikström
  • Xuxiao Ma

Voice actors:

  • Aaron Geldert
  • Eelis Lähteenaro
  • Ida Budolfsen
  • Katie Ballinger
  • Max Salomaa
  • Veera Wikström
